. It includes the villages of Belle Terre, Bellport, Lake Grove, Old Field, Patchogue, Poquott,
Fly to Brookhaven on a plane to LI MacArthur Airport
Ferry to Port Jeff from Bridgeport Conn.

(631) 473-0286

L.I.R.R. train into Ronkonkoma station from NYC
There are several major roads that allow for easy travel to various points of Brookhaven.
The easiest way to travel is by car, though you can also travel by bus or taxi.

value: content=Dedicated in 1991 this monument is housed on Bald Hill, one of the highest points on Long Island and is marked with a 100 foot, red, white and blue, monument.
address=55 S Bicycle Path, Selden, NY 11784
content=Be sure to check out one of the many concerts and shows that come to the Brookhaven Amphitheater.  For a listing of the shows please check out their website.
Walk around Port Jefferson, a seaside city that is full of shops, places to eat, a playground, and boating.

: A public beach, that is very popular in the summer for Long Islanders. There is a campground located along the beach where sites can be rented for a week at a time.  There is a playground and a place to purchase food on the shore as well.  Lifeguards watch over the beach every day from Memorial Day to Labor Day.
directions=I mile north of the LIE Exit 64

content=Something to do for any age, but is frequented most by high school and college students.  There are go-carts, two 18 hole mini-golf courses, batting cages with both fast and slow baseballs and softballs, a driving range and the latest addition to the park, outdoor laser tag.  Please note that Country Fair Park is open only during certain seasons so call or check online for availability.
address=431 East Main Street Riverhead, NY 11901

content=Great for families with small children or anyone interested in sea life and ocean creatures.   There are oceans of sea creatures to see at Atlantis from sea horses to rare fish.  Visitors can pet a stingray, hold a starfish, watch a sea lion show or even go for a swim with the sharks.  There are also riverboat cruises depending on the weather and season.
address=200 Wilson St # B1 Port Jeffrsn Sta, NY 11776
content=Great for families with kids from 2 year to 12 years.  Inflatable slides, giant mazes and obstacle courses encourage fun physical activity without competition.
address=185 Morris Avenue Holtsville, New York 11742
content=A national Amusements movie theater offering a wide variety of movies and show times.

content=With over 140 stores, a food court and a new outdoor mall section, this is the place to head too if you are looking to hit the stores.  There is a wide selection of stores featuring clothing and products for children, young adults, and adults.   If you come at Christmastime, Santa is available to have pictures taken with.
address=655 Long Island Ave Medford, NY 11763-2517

content=Spend a day, playing mini-golf, rock climbing, go-carting, on the roller coaster or the bumper boats, or inside playing a variety of arcade games. Boomers is frequented by families with young children.  The rides are based around kids from elementary school age and younger.  Different bracelets are available for purchase based on which activities you would like to take part in.
address=386 Portion Road, Lake Ronkonkoma, NY 11779
content=Enjoy soft serve or hard ice cream, flying saucers, ice cream cupcakes, or ice cream cakes along with many other frozen desserts hand made in the store.
content=Home of Long Island’s first and only Denny’s.  Denny’s is a family style restaurant, serving a wide variety of foods.
content=Pricy Italian Restaurant that is known for its pizza.  Mama Lombardi’s is part of a Lombardi’s chain, which includes several catering halls and a food also includes market.

content=Family- style Italian restaurant, with a children’s menu for families with younger kids.  They currently have a never ending pasta bowl special where its all the pasta you can eat for one price.
address=142 Main St Port Jefferson, NY 11777-1678
content=Small Mexican cuisine restaurant.  Food can be ordered to stay or to go.  Choose from a wide variety of Mexican food including homemade salsa.
address=996 Middle Country Road Selden, NY 11784

content=
Ice cream is as important as t he meal here, choose from a wide variety of meals and top it off with your perfect sundae.

content=Wide assortment of desserts, from ice cream and shakes to ices in every flavor you can think of and some you wouldn’t.  Ices come in both regular and cream form and are sold in a variety of sizes including a tub for parties or events.  Ralph’s is only open during the warm weather seasons so be sure to call if you are planning to go in the early spring or late fall.
address=289 Middle Country Road Selden, NY 11784
content=Great assortment of food, with a large all you can eat salad bar.
